reasoning_steps: Cost analysis: $60K freelance vs $80K+ full-time fits $85K budget constraint
Timeline assessment: 4-month deadline achievable with experienced team
Risk evaluation: Freelance provides expertise transfer without long-term commitment
Stakeholder alignment: Satisfies cost-conscious owner and quality-focused PM
output.alternative_considered: Full-time hire exceeds budget and has longer onboarding time
output.implementation_plan: Contract includes knowledge transfer and 90-day support period
